otherIdentifier.title: other identifier
otherIdentifier.description: This property refers to a secondary identifier of the Dataset, such as MAST/ADS [MAST-ADS], [DataCite], [DOI], [EZID] or [W3ID].

hasVersion.title: has version
hasVersion.description: A related Dataset that is a version, edition, or adaptation of the described Dataset.

keyword.title: keyword/tag
keyword.description: This property contains a keyword or tag describing the Dataset.

keywordMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

version.title: version
version.description: The version indicator (name or identifier) of a resource

liabilityStatement.title: liability statement
liabilityStatement.description: A liability statement about the dataset

purposeMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

accessRights.title: access rights
accessRights.description: Information that indicates whether the Dataset is open data, has access restrictions or is public.

accrualPeriodicity.title: frequency
accrualPeriodicity.description: This property refers to the frequency at which the Dataset is updated.

oneOf.description: A year and month in YYYY-MM format

creator.title: creator
creator.description: An agent responsible for producing the dataset

description.title: description
description.description: This property contains a free-text account of the Dataset. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the description

descriptionMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

oneOf.description: A year and month in YYYY-MM format

modified.title: last modified
modified.description: The most recent date on which the Dataset was changed or modified.

oneOf.description: A year and month in YYYY-MM format

provenance.title: provenance
provenance.description: A statement about the lineage of a Dataset

publisher.title: publisher
publisher.description: This property refers to an organisation responsible for making the Dataset available.

temporal.title: temporal coverage
temporal.description: This property refers to a temporal period that the dataset  covers.

title.title: title
title.description: This property contains a name given to the Dataset. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the name

titleMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

page.title: documentation
page.description: A page or document about this dataset

qualifiedAttribution.title: qualified attribution
qualifiedAttribution.description: An agent having some form of responsibility for the dataset

wasGeneratedBy.title: was generated by
wasGeneratedBy.description: An activity that generated, or provides the business context for, the creation of the dataset

usageNoteMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}
